# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-102">Dodavanje zastavica i podsetnika u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-103">Da biste postavili ili uredili podsetnik za događaj:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-104">Idite u [Kalendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-105">Izaberite događaj za koji želite da se podseti, a zatim izaberite strelice u gornjem desnom uglu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-106">da biste je razvili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-107">Sledeće da **me podseti**, odaberite vreme podsetnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-108">Outlook.com automatski čuva promene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-109">Da biste se podsetili da pratite poruku, možete da dodate zastavicu za praćenje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-110">Idi na [poštu](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-111">Na listi poruka, zadržite pokazivač iznad poruke da biste videli opciju zastavice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-112">Izaberite ikonu zastavice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-113">da biste označili poruku zastavicom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-114">Da biste videli sve poruke označene zastavicom, izaberite potvrdni znak u donjem levom uglu stranice da biste otišli na zadatke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a0b3d-115">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte [zastavicu ili zakačite poruku u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a0b3d-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
